Package seng201.islandtradergame.core

Class Island

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JLabel
seng201.islandtradergame.core.Island
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class Island
extends javax.swing.JLabel
This class implements an Island that can be travelled to, this island has its own store an posible routes to get here from other islands.
Author:
Kei Carden
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Island

      public Island​(java.lang.String name, Store store, java.util.ArrayList<Route> routes, java.lang.String sprite)
      Creates a island with a name store and list of routes to other islands.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the island
      store - The store object for this island
      routes - The array of routes to other islands from this island
      sprite - The name of the image the island will be

  • Method Details

    • loadImages

      private void loadImages()
      Loads in the image file which can be changed by changing the isalndSprite string. This image has its size setup this is based of the images width and height.

    • paintComponent

      public void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the image to the screen each time the paint component is called.

    • routeDistance

      public int routeDistance​(int routeSelection)
      Returns the distance the other island is from the current island
      Parameters:
      routeSelection - An index of the islandRoutes list for the selected route
      Returns:
      int The distance the island is

    • getRoutes

      public java.util.ArrayList<Route> getRoutes​(Island island)
      Creates a list of all the routes to an island for the current island from the islands routes list
      Parameters:
      island - The island the player wants to travel to
      Returns:
      ArrayList A list of all the possible routes to this island
